body.name: Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO SL DDR4 32GB (2x16GB) 3600MHz CL18 Intel XMP 2.0 AMD Ryzen iCUE Compatible Computer Memory - Black (CMH32GX4M2D3600C18)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 29 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 29 mins
features: Illuminate your system with vivid, animated lighting from ten individually addressable, ultra-bright RGB LEDs per module.
Choose from dozens of preset lighting profiles, or create your own in CORSAIR iCUE software.
Just 44mm tall for wide compatibility with air coolers such as the CORSAIR A500.
Optimized for maximum bandwidth and tight response times on the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards.
A custom performance PCB provides the highest signal quality for the greatest level of performance and stability.
VENGEANCE RGB PRO SL modules use only tightly screened memory chips, for extended overclocking potential.
Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and synchronize lighting with other CORSAIR RGB products, including coolers, keyboards and fans.
A solid aluminum heat-spreader improves thermal conductivity for superb memory cooling even when overclocked, with modern styling to complement your RGB lighting.
Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for simple one-setting installation and setup.
body.description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB PRO SL DDR4 memory lights up your PC while delivering peak performance in a compact form factor just 44mm tall for wide compatibility with CPU coolers. Every module boasts ten bright, individually controlled RGB LEDs for brilliant illumination. Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and completely customize every module’s lighting to match your system, create your own custom lighting profiles, and synchronize lighting across all your CORSAIR products. A custom PCB provides superb signal quality for superb performance and stability on the latest Intel® and AMD DDR4 motherboards, while tightly screened memory chips unlock superior overclocking ability. For mesmerizing, completely customizable RGB lighting and the best in DDR4 performance, equip your PC with VENGEANCE RGB PRO SL.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OPTIMIZED FOR INTEL AND AMD CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB PRO SL DDR4 memory lights up your PC with dynamic, individually addressable RGB lighting, while delivering peak performance in a compact form factor.
INTELLIGENT CONTROL, UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and synchronize lighting with other CORSAIR RGB products, including coolers, keyboards and fans.

PERFORMANCE HERITAGE Each Vengeance RGB PRO SL modules starts with our custom performance PCB and tightly screened memory chips to provide incredible frequencies, for maximum bandwidth and tight response times on all platforms.
COMPACT FORM FACTOR Standing at just 44mm tall for wider compatibility with air coolers and smaller form factor chassis, each module looks great from any angle.
ONE STEP OVERCLOCKING With Intel XMP 2.0 support, a single BIOS setting is all that’s required to set your memory to its ideal performance settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high performance
reviews.reviewText: This RAM is priced well for a high end brand with high performance plus the RGB. This is the coolest looking RAM in my opinion. Very easy to install. Bright lighting and low heat makes a perfect gaming component.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and installation is a breeze! The RGB also looks amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing ram and evenbetter if you know which version you have for OC
reviews.reviewText: These are already great out of the box, but i would dwell into OCing them and understanding the process to get the best bang for buck value. On the back of my sticks i have ver 8.35 which is nanya type(amazing for OC)As you see in my picture not only was i able to OC from stock 3600 to 3800m,hz i was also able to get good timings, dropping it from cl18 to cl16. Stable through test mem 5 with the extreme profile and with occt mem test as well both took like 2 days of stress testing and holding strong.I would say make sure to see which ver number you have on the back of your sticks before inserting them in so that you know which version you have to get a good idea of how good your sticks can OC if you wanted to in the near future.Just to point out i have a 5900x(with pbo2 settings) and a rtx 3070. In 3d time spy benchmark my cpu score jumped from 12000 to 15594 all by just overclocking my ram. Ive also notice huge fps performance in a lot of games that i play. Lots of value all from just tinkering my ram. Very happy with my results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation, RGB works as expected and it's a beautiful addition to the build. Worth the price would buy again and again if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: easy to install works great, really good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased while upgrading my build, and have zero complaints. Performs as expected, no issues, and looks great installed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best ddr4 rams
reviews.reviewText: Product was purchased as a Christmas gift.Was easy to install and activate via XMP profile in bios. Very fast for ddr4. Rgb looks bright and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and Stylish RAM Upgrade for Enhanced Performance
reviews.reviewText: upgraded my computer's memory with two sticks of RAM, and it has significantly improved my system's performance. Below, I will outline the pros and cons of these RAM sticks based on my personal experience:Pros: Impressive 32GB Capacity: The inclusion of two 16GB RAM sticks has provided a substantial boost to my computer's memory capacity. With a total of 32GB, I can comfortably run memory-intensive applications, multitask effortlessly, and handle demanding tasks such as video editing, 3D rendering, and gaming without experiencing any slowdowns. Aesthetic Enhancement for an All White Build: These RAM sticks perfectly complemented my all white computer build, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication to the overall aesthetics. The clean and sleek design effortlessly integrates with the color scheme, creating a visually appealing setup. Vibrant and Eye-Catching Colors: The vibrant colors of the RAM sticks enhance the visual appeal of the interior components. Whether it's the heat spreaders or the LED lighting, the colors add a dynamic and captivating element to the overall look of the system. It's a delightful sight that adds personality to the build. Easy Installation: Installing these RAM sticks was a breeze. The sticks fit seamlessly into the RAM slots on my motherboard, and the installation process was straightforward. The user-friendly design ensures that even those with limited technical knowledge can successfully upgrade their system's memory.Cons: Higher Price Tag: While these RAM sticks offer excellent performance and aesthetic appeal, they may not be the most budget-friendly option on the market. The advanced features, larger capacity, and eye-catching design contribute to a higher price point compared to more basic RAM options. However, the enhanced performance and visual impact may justify the investment for those seeking a high-quality and visually pleasing upgrade.In summary, the two sticks of RAM provide a substantial boost to your computer's memory capacity, allowing for smooth multitasking and seamless performance, especially for resource-intensive tasks. The stylish design and vibrant colors enhance the visual appeal of your system, particularly in an all white build. The easy installation process ensures a hassle-free upgrade experience. However, it's worth noting that these RAM sticks come with a higher price tag compared to more basic options. If you prioritize performance, aesthetics, and are willing to invest in a premium RAM upgrade, these sticks are a fantastic choice for taking your system to the next level.

Estoy armando una pc blanca y me van perfecto, las velocidades de las memorias llegan a las especificadas en el producto y los leds se ven muy bien.El único defecto es que al apagarse o reiniciarse se desconfigura el color de los leds, pero una vez inicado el pc se re-configura, desconozco si teniendo la unidad de control de Corsair desaparezca este inconveniente.
Muito satisfeito.Produto de otima qualidade recomendo a todos.

The Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3600MHz memory kit is a compelling choice for users seeking both eye-catching aesthetics and high-performance memory for their gaming or content creation setups. In this review, I will share my experience with this memory kit, focusing on its design, performance, ease of installation, and overall value.Design and Aesthetics:The standout feature of the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL memory kit is its stunning design. The sleek and low-profile aluminum heatspreaders not only enhance the overall aesthetics of the memory modules but also contribute to effective heat dissipation. The customizable RGB lighting offers an impressive range of vibrant colors and lighting effects, allowing users to personalize their setups and synchronize the lighting with other compatible Corsair products. Whether you prefer subtle illumination or want to create a mesmerizing light show, the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL delivers on both style and visual impact.Performance:With a frequency of DDR4 3600MHz and low latency, the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL memory kit provides excellent performance for demanding tasks. Whether you're gaming, editing videos, or running memory-intensive applications, this kit delivers responsive and smooth performance. The ample capacity of 32GB ensures seamless multitasking and the ability to handle resource-hungry tasks without experiencing any slowdowns. The high-quality memory chips and robust PCB design contribute to stability and reliable performance, even under heavy workloads.Easy Installation:Installing the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL memory kit is a straightforward process. The memory modules fit seamlessly into most standard DIMM slots, and the XMP 2.0 support simplifies the setup process by automatically configuring the optimal memory settings. The Corsair iCUE software provides an intuitive interface for customizing the RGB lighting effects, allowing users to easily sync the lighting with other Corsair components and create a cohesive visual theme.Compatibility:The Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL memory kit is compatible with a wide range of motherboards and platforms, including both Intel and AMD systems. This ensures that most users can benefit from the exceptional performance and stunning aesthetics that this kit offers. It's always recommended to verify compatibility with your specific motherboard before making a purchase.Value for Money:While the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL memory kit is priced at a premium, it offers excellent value for users who prioritize both performance and aesthetics. The combination of high-frequency memory, low latency, ample capacity, and customizable RGB lighting justifies the investment for enthusiasts and gamers looking to enhance their PC experience.Final Thoughts:The Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3600MHz memory kit strikes an impressive balance between style and performance. With its stunning design, exceptional performance, easy installation, and compatibility with a wide range of systems, this memory kit is a worthy choice for users looking to elevate their PC setup. Whether you're seeking top-tier gaming performance or a visually stunning workstation, the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL delivers on both fronts.Disclaimer: I purchased the Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL 32GB DDR4 3600MHz memory kit independently and did not receive it as part of any specific program or incentive. My review is solely based on my personal experience and observations with this memory kit.

Die Riegel ließen sich einfach installieren und wurden im BIOS direkt erkannt. Das XMP-Profil läuft ohne zu mucken und die Beleuchtung lässt sich wunderbar mit SignalRGB steuern.Falls sich im Langzeittest Probleme einschleichen, werde ich diese in meine Bewertung aufnehmen.Bis jetzt gibt es aber nichts zu meckern.

RAM fühlt sich hochwertig an und funktioniert einwandfrei. Die LEDs sind ausreichend diffus, sodass einzelne LEDs kaum erkennbar sind. Sehr umfangreiche und intuitive Software zur Programmierung der Beleuchtung. Beachtenswert finde ich auch, dass sich die Standardbeleuchtung (wenn die Software nicht läuft, z.B. während dem Booten) auch damit ändern lässt.
